main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering at 30 feet altitude with lights and emitting a buzzing sound.
interesting points: The object was reported to be 2-3 feet in diameter, The observation lasted for 30 seconds, The object had 6 lights and performed quick up and down movements, The object emitted a reddish glow and disappeared suddenly after a flash, Some neighbors reported seeing a similar object and can testify to the sighting.
